sentences.sContent: He was a printer by trade and naturalist by avocation.
sentences.sCn: 他在印刷厂工作，同时是个博物学爱好者。

remMethod.val: a (不) + vocation (职业) → 非职业 → 副业； 不要把vocation (职业) 和vacation (度假) 相混

trans.tranOther: Your avocation is a job or activity that you do because you are interested in it, rather than to earn your living
